cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography: Michael is a 2021 graduate of the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Arts (LAMDA) where he just completed an MA in Classical Acting. There, he was the proud recipient of the Fulbright Scholarship, receiving a fully-funded place on the course through the John Wood Acting Award. Michael is an alumnus of the University of Washington School of Drama and has studied at Shakespeare's Globe and the Edinburgh Festivals. His mission is to perform works filled with heart and humor, creating pieces that make people feel less alone in the world.
details.name: Michael Monicatti
